content: the 4-0-1 the 4-0-1 is my plain vanilla sock pattern i hope you will be able to knit many well-fitting socks using my recipe for pattern support please contact support@thepassioknitspinner de material gauge 1 skein of fingering weight yarn with roughly 400-420 meters 32 stitches x 40 rounds = 10 cm in stockinette per 100 grams 2 75 mm double pointed knitting needles or needle size to get gauge tapestry needle instructions for size 39/40 cuff and leg notes cast on 64 stitches long tail cast on or any other stretchy cast on you prefer divide them onto 4 needles 16 stitches each if you prefer to knit magic-loop you can absolutely do that the → join in the round and knit in 2x2 rib for 20 rounds knit 2 instructions are written for double pointed needles purl 2 all the way around start knitting in stockinette stitch and keep going until your please make sure you hit stitch gauge or your socks won t fit row sock measures 16 18 cm from the cast on gauge is not that important for this pattern as you will knit to a certain measurement heel the pattern is fully written for one size but there is a spreadsheet at the heel is knit over only half of your stitches 32 the end of this pattern for a total of 8 sizes once you have read or knit the long version you will be able to swap out the numbers the heel is worked over needles 1 and 4 so the first and last of your from the spreadsheet to knit every size double pointed needles that way the seam where your stitches won´t fully align as you jump to the next round is in the back knit needles 1 2 and 3 in stockinette you need to get to tutorials needle 4 so you can start the heel set-up row i have created three different video tutorials to help you with your once you are ready to knit needle number 4 knit 1 through sock knitting the back loop the first stitch of needle 4 purl 2 stitches knit the remaining stitches of needle 4 and continue knitting onto 1 casting on for socks the same needle working the stitches
